venue.address_1: Smith & Wollensky - Atlantic Wharf 294 Congress Street Boston, MA 02210 Phone: 617.778.2200 Fax: 617.778.3956
venue.name: Smith & Wollensky

item.description:
Come join us for Restaurant week in Boston.  This is a chance to dine in one of the finest steak houses in Boston at a reduced price.

Below is the prix fixe menu

Choose one from each starters, entree, dessert all for $49.00 per person which includes your meal, tax and tip.

STARTERS

Wollensky Salad
romaine, teardrop tomatoes, potato croutons, bacon lardons and mushrooms with house vinaigrette

Baby Heirloom Tomato, Mozzarella and Arugula Salad

Wollensky's Famous Split Pea Soup
with croutons

ENTRÉES

Vegetarian selection available upon request
Pan Seared Salmon
caramelized leek and mushroom risotto with a smoky tomato sauce

Braised Short Rib
roasted vegetables and natural jus

Free-Range Chicken
roasted breast, leg-thigh confit and natural jus served with roasted fingerling potatoes

10 oz. Filet Mignon
Select preparation: simply grilled, coffee and cocoa rubbed, foie gras mushroom ragout
add $5 per order

DESSERTS

Coconut Cake
passion fruit sauce

Chocolate Cake
layered with chocolate ganache

 

Please Note:
Restaurant Week prix fixe menus cost $38.13 for three-course dinner, $20.13 for three-course lunch and $15.13 for two-course lunch, depending on participation and availability. Prices do not include beverages, tax or gratuity. Menus are subject to change

 

 

Smith & Wollensky - Atlantic Wharf
294 Congress Street
Boston, MA 02210
Phone: 617.778.2200
Fax: 617.778.3956
item.name: Smith & Wollensky Celebrate Restaurant Week in Boston
